articles.title: Trump ends Japan leg of Asia tour after meeting Sanae Takaichi - BBC
articles.description: The red carpet was rolled out for Trump by Japan's Sanae Takaichi, who has only been prime minister since last week.
articles.content:
Anthony Zurcher,North America correspondent and 
Shaimaa Khalil,Tokyo correspondent
Watch: Trump addresses cheering troops on US carrier in Japan
